root: ^Damn, there's no use in hiding any longer.
^My frame and broom makes it hard to hide effectively from everyone, after all!
^Now, what is your business with me? I'm busy keeping this place clean, so let's make this quick.
^You know that it's rude to ask someone for their undergarments, especially while they're wearing them!
^(This could be the ticket to get out of these dumps and straight into his home!)
^How about this - in the tradition of us ogres, if you get to defeat me in hand-to-hand combat, you're free to claim from me whatever you like.
^Be it the panties alone, or something more...
^Only the strong are worth to be served by me!
